title: Firefly
subtle: Concept (fiction), 42 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: Catching fireflies on summer nights is a fun and memorable experience for many kids. In Firefly, a girl tries to catch fireflies every night of the week. Will she finally catch one on Sunday? Detailed illustrations and repetitive text support emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to sequence events as well as to retell the story to better understand the text.
reviewWords: catching, Friday, Monday, Saturday, Sunday, Thursday, tried, Tuesday, Wednesday
awareness: Initial Sound                : Discriminate initial consonant /t/ sound
grammar: Pronouns : Identify and use the pronoun I correctly
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Understand and arrange words in alphabetical order
